website_summaries.verdict: You can choose from many different striped patterns and colors to enjoy this well-made tie in a style that best suits your fashion sense.
pros: Comes in many different striped patterns, featuring vibrant and lovely colors
Colors are complementary to many differently colored shirts, making this a versatile choice
This tie is well made and arrives nicely packaged
cons: May be longer than other ties

customer_reviews.title: False advertising.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a woven tie. I was sent a silky tie by "Luther Pike Seattle." It doesn't say what it's made out of but I can tell it's not woven and there are no stripe patterns at all. It's 100% fully black and the wrong material. This is not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp tie at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a simple tie for a funeral. This tie is so sharp. I love the variations of grey in it. My daughter’s friend liked it so much that he borrowed it for the prom. We never got it back but that’s okay because it’s inexpensive enough to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lever

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Goes perfectly with every color dress shirt and the subtle stripes look fantastic with a suit as well. My only minor complaint is it runs slightly longer in the sense that it's meant for more complex knots than the typical 'lazy' knot as I like it call it. I like my knot to be tight but I find the tie goes passed my belt if it's too tight. Not the worst thing ever - I'll just need to stop being lazy with my knots! Don't pass this tie up - it's an instant favorite
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality at an exceptional price. Needed a black tie for a special event but didn't want a plain black tie. The subtle striping in this tie is perfect and I was surprised at the very high quality for the price. Very pleased with this tie
customer_reviews.author: csb

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these ties for the men in my wedding. It was a nice tie, but the blue/black combo looks very different than the photo. It looks almost black and it is hard to tell the difference between the blue and black. In some lights it looks more gray than black. While the ties were nice, I returned them as they were far too dark for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not completely pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tie because of the picture posted in the Ad. At that time, the pattern and color seemed very elegant. However, I don't know if the colors of my monitor are wrong, but once received it, I was little disappointed with the appearance and how the real colors and quality of the material look like.
customer_reviews.author: AlexL

customer_reviews.title: Nice patriotic tie
customer_reviews.text: I wore this tie to a "Freedom Sunday" concert at church. About 4 members of our choir bought them. Everyone loved them! Not sure how you can call a synthetic tie "silk" but it is a nice feeling poly material. I have a lot of very expensive ties so I knew it would not be silk, but sellers should not be calling stuff silk when they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Grantom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like a decent tie, and to an extent it is. However, the small loop behind the tie that keeps the excess in place broke loose during it’s first use. I clipped it into place for the time being but it isn’t what you want out of a brand new tie. Could be a fluke but I’d rather not buy one of these again
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Coloring is off in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Eh. The quality was nice but the color in the picture makes it deceiving. Don't get it unless you're flexible on how the purple will turn out! We needed it for a wedding and it wasn't even close to what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Purple tie
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for purple and grey tie for a gender flipped Night Vale cosplay. This fits the bill. Fabric is a little bit uh... damageable feeling (like it might snag easily if you have rough hands) I have no idea if that is normal for ties.
customer_reviews.author: starflowergardener

customer_reviews.title: A nice subtle tie that gives a lot of mileage to ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice subtle tie that gives a lot of mileage to wearing options.It works well with gray, black and navy shirts and suits and sportcoats.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: We went on a cruise and my husband looked great in this tie. It feels a little cheap/weird fabric, but he looked GREAT! For the price it worked great. We only needed a tie for a couple of nights, so this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice tie
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking tie. Feels and looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: S. Green

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this tie for the price. I took a chance just to see, and it worked out. Good length and a nice knot. A keeper.
customer_reviews.author: JBoulder

customer_reviews.title: Used for a wedding
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a friends wedding (we all wore this exact tie). What can I say other than I received what I purchased and it was as genuine a tie as I have ever purchased. Shipping was the quickest I have ever had on a product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwiz88

customer_reviews.title: Nice tie, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality tie. The man I bought it for was really happy with this white tie, not just a plain look but some pattern in the material.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice tie
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking tie. It's nice fabric and well made. There aren't any loose strings or anything like that. It was well packaged, arrived just two days after I ordered it and I would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Tie
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tie for my son-in-law who just became a U.S. Citizen this fall. Very pleased with how handsome he looked in it!

customer_reviews.title: Old school Glory!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my favorite prep school tie in a high quality store only to have my kid confiscate it. Bought this one of equally fine quality for 40% less!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tie. The blue is a must have.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This tie was better than I expected. My wife loves it. Worn it last night to a (high dollar) dinner and it worked perfect with my suit. Going to buy the silver one next.

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: We got this tie for a medical exhibition, and it looks so great with men's white formal dress. Also, include that has a high quality for the price.

customer_reviews.text: Very lovely and beautiful to wear. But ... it fell apart. My wife had to read-stitch over half the length.

product_meta.title: Secdtie Men's Classic Stripe Jacquard Woven Silk Tie Formal Party Suit Necktie
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :15 x 2.7 x 1.1 inches; 0.63 Ounces
 * Item model number :Tie17Mar2017-3-17-101
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :March 19, 2017
 * ASIN :B06XQXL2S7

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #28,420 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #21 inMen's Neckties 
    *  #7243 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars670 ratings
feature_bullets: Business fashion necktie, Length: 145cm(57.09"), widest: 8cm(3.15"), Material: care-free microfiber polyester silk, Dry cleaning, low temperature ironing

Get dynamic in your choice of high intensity neckties this season and opt for one of our most favorite striped ties in statement reds. This bold and brazen menswear accessories shimmers and shines with plenty of personality and panache.
Add a heavy dose of swagger to your All-American work wear with this classically striped designer necktie in polished shades of blues and whites. Available 11 styles Necktie.

This "preppy" striped tie in navy and bright white is perfect for any fashion conscious businessman. Have a closer look at the fabric to capture the intricate fabric weave: The navy stripes are made from a smooth satin-fabric that has excellent shine while the white stripes have a very fine small check ribbed pattern.

Matching this tie is quite easy. Best are dress shirts in white and blue, and suits in blue, gray and tan. If you are looking to combine more patterns to this tie then make sure to choose finer patterns such as small checks on shirts or narrow pin-stripes on suits.
